gain.docs:
**enum**: The gain. Implicitly selects the channel. Defaults to `128`.
  * `32` (Channel B, gain 32)
  
  * `64` (Channel A, gain 64)
  
  * `128` (Channel A, gain 128)
  
  

*See also: [HX711 Load Cell Amplifier](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/hx711.html#configuration-variables)*

update_interval.docs:
**[Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The interval to check the sensor. Defaults to `60s`.

*See also: [HX711 Load Cell Amplifier](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/hx711.html#configuration-variables)*
